verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came again to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying,
<S%H1121>You,<s%> son of <S%H120>man,<s%> take <S%H5375>up<s%> a <S%H7015>lamentation<s%> over <S%H6865>Tyre;<s%>

and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H6865>Tyre,<s%> you who <S%H3427>dwell<s%> at the <S%H3997>entry<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> who are the <S%H7402>merchant<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> to <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H339>islands,<s%> thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H6865>You,<s%> Tyre, have <S%H559>said,<s%> I am <S%H3632>perfect<s%> in <S%H3308>beauty.<s%>
Your <S%H1366>borders<s%> are in the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H3220>seas;<s%> your <S%H1129>builders<s%> have <S%H3634>perfected<s%> your <S%H3308>beauty.<s%>

They have <S%H1129>made<s%> all your <S%H3871>planks<s%> of fir <S%H1265>trees<s%> from <S%H8149>Senir;<s%> they have <S%H3947>taken<s%> a <S%H730>cedar<s%> from <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> to <S%H6213>make<s%> a mast for <S%H8650>you.<s%>

Of the <S%H437>oaks<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> have they <S%H6213>made<s%> your <S%H4880>oars;<s%> they have <S%H6213>made<s%> your <S%H7175>benches<s%> of <S%H8127>ivory<s%> <S%H1323>inlaid<s%> in <S%H839>boxwood,<s%> from the <S%H339>islands<s%> of <S%H3794>Kittim.<s%>

<S%H4666>Of<s%> fine <S%H8336>linen<s%> with embroidered <S%H7553>work<s%> from <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> was your <S%H5251>sail,<s%> that it might be to you for a <S%H8504>banner;<s%> blue and <S%H713>purple<s%> from the <S%H339>islands<s%> of <S%H473>Elishah<s%> was your <S%H4374>awning.<s%>
The <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H6721>Sidon<s%> and <S%H719>Arvad<s%> were your <S%H7751>rowers:<s%> your <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H6865>men,<s%> Tyre, were in <S%H2259>you,<s%> they were your pilots.

The <S%H2205>old<s%> men of <S%H1380>Gebal<s%> and the <S%H2450>wise<s%> men of it were in you your <S%H919>repairers<s%> of ship <S%H591>seams:<s%> all the ships of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> with their <S%H4419>mariners<s%> were in you to <S%H6148>deal<s%> in your <S%H4627>merchandise.<s%>

<S%H6539>Persia<s%> and <S%H3865>Lud<s%> and <S%H6316>Put<s%> were in your <S%H2428>army,<s%> your <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war:<s%> they <S%H8518>hanged<s%> the <S%H4043>shield<s%> and <S%H3553>helmet<s%> in <S%H5414>you;<s%> they set forth your <S%H1926>comeliness.<s%>

The <S%H1121>men<s%> of <S%H719>Arvad<s%> with your <S%H2428>army<s%> were on your <S%H2346>walls<s%> all <S%H5439>around,<s%> and <S%H1575>valorous<s%> men were in your <S%H4026>towers;<s%> they <S%H8518>hanged<s%> their <S%H7982>shields<s%> on your <S%H2346>walls<s%> all <S%H5439>around;<s%> they <S%H3634>have<s%> <S%H3634>perfected<s%> your <S%H3308>beauty.<s%>

<S%H8659>Tarshish<s%> was your <S%H5503>merchant<s%> by reason of the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of all kinds of <S%H1952>riches;<s%> with <S%H3701>silver,<s%> <S%H1270>iron,<s%> <S%H913>tin,<s%> and <S%H5777>lead,<s%> they <S%H5414>traded<s%> for your <S%H5801>wares.<s%>

<S%H3120>Javan,<s%> <S%H8422>Tubal,<s%> and <S%H4902>Meshech,<s%> they were your <S%H7402>traffickers;<s%> they <S%H5414>traded<s%> the <S%H5315>persons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> and <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%> for your <S%H4627>merchandise.<s%>
They of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H8425>Togarmah<s%> <S%H5414>traded<s%> for your wares with <S%H5483>horses<s%> and war <S%H6571>horses<s%> and <S%H6505>mules.<s%>

The <S%H1121>men<s%> of <S%H1719>Dedan<s%> were your <S%H7402>traffickers;<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H339>islands<s%> were the <S%H5506>market<s%> of your <S%H3027>hand:<s%> they <S%H7725>brought<s%> you in <S%H814>exchange<s%> <S%H7161>horns<s%> of <S%H8127>ivory<s%> and <S%H1894>ebony.<s%>

<S%H758>Syria<s%> was your <S%H5503>merchant<s%> by reason of the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of your <S%H4639>handiworks:<s%> they <S%H5414>traded<s%> for your <S%H5801>wares<s%> with <S%H5306>emeralds,<s%> <S%H713>purple,<s%> and embroidered <S%H7553>work,<s%> and fine <S%H948>linen,<s%> and <S%H7215>coral,<s%> and <S%H3539>rubies.<s%>

<S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> they were your <S%H7402>traffickers:<s%> they <S%H5414>traded<s%> for your <S%H4627>merchandise<s%> <S%H2406>wheat<s%> of <S%H4511>Minnith,<s%> and <S%H6436>confections,<s%> and <S%H1706>honey,<s%> and <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H6875>balm.<s%>

<S%H1834>Damascus<s%> was your <S%H5503>merchant<s%> for the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of your <S%H4639>handiworks,<s%> by reason of the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of all kinds of <S%H1952>riches,<s%> with the <S%H3196>wine<s%> of <S%H2463>Helbon,<s%> and <S%H6713>white<s%> <S%H6785>wool.<s%>

<S%H2051>Vedan<s%> and <S%H3120>Javan<s%> <S%H235>traded<s%> with yarn <S%H5414>for<s%> your <S%H5801>wares:<s%> <S%H6219>bright<s%> <S%H1270>iron,<s%> <S%H6916>cassia,<s%> and <S%H7070>calamus,<s%> were among your <S%H4627>merchandise.<s%>
<S%H1719>Dedan<s%> was your <S%H7402>trafficker<s%> in <S%H2667>precious<s%> <S%H899>cloths<s%> for <S%H7396>riding.<s%>

<S%H6152>Arabia,<s%> and all the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of <S%H6938>Kedar,<s%> they were the <S%H5503>merchants<s%> of your <S%H3027>hand;<s%> in <S%H3733>lambs,<s%> and <S%H352>rams,<s%> and <S%H6260>goats,<s%> in these were they your <S%H5503>merchants.<s%>

The <S%H7402>traffickers<s%> of <S%H7614>Sheba<s%> and <S%H7484>Raamah,<s%> they were your <S%H7402>traffickers;<s%> they <S%H5414>traded<s%> for your <S%H5801>wares<s%> with the <S%H7218>chief<s%> of all <S%H1314>spices,<s%> and with all <S%H3368>precious<s%> <S%H68>stones,<s%> and <S%H2091>gold.<s%>
<S%H2771>Haran<s%> and <S%H3656>Canneh<s%> and <S%H5729>Eden,<s%> the <S%H7402>traffickers<s%> of <S%H7614>Sheba,<s%> <S%H804>Asshur<s%> and <S%H3638>Chilmad,<s%> were your <S%H7402>traffickers.<s%>

These were your <S%H7402>traffickers<s%> in <S%H4360>choice<s%> <S%H1545>wares,<s%> in wrappings of <S%H8504>blue<s%> and embroidered <S%H7553>work,<s%> and in <S%H1595>chests<s%> of rich <S%H1264>clothing,<s%> <S%H2280>bound<s%> with <S%H2256>cords<s%> and made of <S%H729>cedar,<s%> among your <S%H4819>merchandise.<s%>

The <S%H591>ships<s%> of <S%H8659>Tarshish<s%> were your <S%H7788>caravans<s%> for your <S%H4627>merchandise:<s%> and you were <S%H4390>replenished,<s%> and made <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3513>glorious<s%> in the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H3220>seas.<s%>

Your <S%H7751>rowers<s%> have <S%H935>brought<s%> you into <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4325>waters:<s%> the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> has <S%H7665>broken<s%> you in the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H3220>seas.<s%>

Your <S%H1952>riches,<s%> and your <S%H5801>wares,<s%> your <S%H4627>merchandise,<s%> your <S%H4419>mariners,<s%> and your <S%H2259>pilots,<s%> your <S%H919>repairers<s%> of ship <S%H6148>seams,<s%> and the dealers in your <S%H4627>merchandise,<s%> and all your <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war,<s%> who are in <S%H6951>you,<s%> with all your company which is in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H5307>you,<s%> shall fall into the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H3220>seas<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of your <S%H4658>ruin.<s%>
At the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H2201>cry<s%> of your <S%H2259>pilots<s%> the <S%H4054>suburbs<s%> shall <S%H7493>shake.<s%>

All who <S%H8610>handled<s%> the <S%H4880>oar,<s%> the <S%H4419>mariners,<s%> and all the <S%H2259>pilots<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> shall come <S%H3381>down<s%> from their <S%H591>ships;<s%> they shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> on the <S%H776>land,<s%>

and shall cause their <S%H6963>voice<s%> to be <S%H8085>heard<s%> over <S%H2199>you,<s%> and shall cry <S%H4751>bitterly,<s%> and shall cast <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H6083>dust<s%> on their <S%H7218>heads,<s%> they shall <S%H6428>wallow<s%> themselves in the <S%H665>ashes:<s%>

and they shall <S%H7144>make<s%> themselves <S%H7139>bald<s%> for <S%H2296>you,<s%> and clothe them with <S%H8242>sackcloth,<s%> and they shall <S%H1058>weep<s%> for you in <S%H4751>bitterness<s%> of <S%H5315>soul<s%> with <S%H4751>bitter<s%> <S%H4553>mourning.<s%>

In their <S%H5204>wailing<s%> they shall take <S%H5375>up<s%> a <S%H7015>lamentation<s%> for <S%H6969>you,<s%> and lament over <S%H6865>you,<s%> saying, Who is there like Tyre, like her who is brought to <S%H1822>silence<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea?<s%>

When your <S%H5801>wares<s%> went <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H3220>seas,<s%> you <S%H7646>filled<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>peoples;<s%> you enriched the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> with the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of your <S%H1952>riches<s%> and of your <S%H4627>merchandise.<s%>

In the <S%H6256>time<s%> that you were <S%H7665>broken<s%> by the <S%H3220>seas<s%> in the <S%H4615>depths<s%> of the <S%H4325>waters,<s%> your <S%H4627>merchandise<s%> and all your <S%H6951>company<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> in your <S%H8432>midst.<s%>

All the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H339>islands<s%> are <S%H8074>astonished<s%> at <S%H4428>you,<s%> and their kings are <S%H8178>horribly<s%> <S%H8175>afraid;<s%> they are <S%H7481>troubled<s%> in their <S%H6440>face.<s%>
The <S%H5503>merchants<s%> among the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> <S%H8319>hiss<s%> at <S%H1091>you;<s%> you are become a terror, and you shall nevermore have any <S%H5704>being.<s%>
